languages.text: "Еще недавно я тебя спас, а теперь ты пытаешься меня убить. Вижу, ты научил{mf|ся|ась} жить на шпилях. Ревущие, прикончите людишко медленно, я хочу позабавиться {mf|его|ее} мучениями".
"I only just saved you and now you're trying to kill me. You've learned how to live in the spires, I see. Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly. I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."
languages.original_text: "Еще недавно я тебя спас, а теперь ты пытаешься меня убить. Вижу, ты научил{mf|ся|ась} жить на шпилях. Ревущие, прикончите людишко медленно, я хочу позабавиться {mf|его|ее} мучениями".

traits.locale_text: "I only just saved you and now you're trying to kill me. You've learned how to live in the spires, I see. Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly. I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "I only just saved you and now you're trying to kill me. You've learned how to live in the spires, I see. Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly. I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “我才刚刚救了你一命，你这就打算要我的命。看得出来，你已经学会了如何在尖塔中生活。尖啸者们，别让这个小人儿死得太快，我要好好享受{mf|他|她}的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "I only just saved you and now you're trying to kill me. You've learned how to live in the spires, I see. Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly. I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

traits.locale_text: “我才刚刚救了你一命，你这就打算要我的命。看得出来，你已经学会了如何在尖塔中生活。尖啸者们，别让这个小人儿死得太快，我要好好享受{mf|他|她}的痛苦。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Acabo de salvarte y ya quieres matarme. Veo que has aprendido a vivir en las torres. Aulladores, matad lentamente a est{mf|e|a} human{mf|o|a}. Quiero disfrutar de su tormento».
languages.original_text: "I only just saved you and now you're trying to kill me. You've learned how to live in the spires, I see. Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly. I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

traits.locale_text: «Acabo de salvarte y ya quieres matarme. Veo que has aprendido a vivir en las torres. Aulladores, matad lentamente a est{mf|e|a} human{mf|o|a}. Quiero disfrutar de su tormento».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「貴様を助けたばかりなのに、もう恩を仇で返すのか。尖塔での生き方をしっかり学んだようだな。シュリーカーども、この人間をなぶり殺せ。奴が苦痛に顔をゆがめるのをじっくりと見たい」
languages.original_text: "I only just saved you and now you're trying to kill me. You've learned how to live in the spires, I see. Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly. I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

traits.locale_text: 「貴様を助けたばかりなのに、もう恩を仇で返すのか。尖塔での生き方をしっかり学んだようだな。シュリーカーども、この人間をなぶり殺せ。奴が苦痛に顔をゆがめるのをじっくりと見たい」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch eben erst gerettet, und nun versucht Ihr, mich zu töten. Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr die Lebensweise der Türme schnell erlernt. Kreischer, tötet den Menschling langsam. Ich will {mf|seine|ihre} Qualen genießen."
languages.original_text: "I only just saved you and now you're trying to kill me. You've learned how to live in the spires, I see. Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly. I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch eben erst gerettet, und nun versucht Ihr, mich zu töten. Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr die Lebensweise der Türme schnell erlernt. Kreischer, tötet den Menschling langsam. Ich will {mf|seine|ihre} Qualen genießen."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Je viens de vous sauver et vous tentez déjà de me tuer. Je vois que vous avez appris les coutumes des tours. Hurleurs, tuez l'{mf|humain|humaine} lentement. Je veux savourer sa souffrance. »
languages.original_text: "I only just saved you and now you're trying to kill me. You've learned how to live in the spires, I see. Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly. I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

traits.locale_text: « Je viens de vous sauver et vous tentez déjà de me tuer. Je vois que vous avez appris les coutumes des tours. Hurleurs, tuez l'{mf|humain|humaine} lentement. Je veux savourer sa souffrance. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Az evvel canını kurtardım, sense beni öldürmeye kalkıyorsun. Kulelerde nasıl yaşandığını öğrenmişsin, belli. Çığırtkanlar, insancığı yavaşça öldürün. Izdırabının keyfini çıkarmak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I only just saved you and now you're trying to kill me. You've learned how to live in the spires, I see. Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly. I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

traits.locale_text: "Az evvel canını kurtardım, şimdiyse beni öldürmeye kalkıyorsun. Kulelerde nasıl yaşandığını öğrenmişsin, belli. Çığırtkanlar, insancığı yavaşça öldürün. Izdırabının keyfini çıkarmak isterim."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
